analysis:
Analysis of SHEL sentiment from last week through today:

Last week (2025-08-08 to 2025-08-14): The sentiment was predominantly neutral, with several news items related to "Transaction in Own Shares" and one concerning "Big Oil Bails on Colombia's Offshore Oil and Gas Provinces." There was also one positive news item regarding U.S. Majors' profits while BP and Shell were reportedly stalling. A negative item highlighted Trump's tariff threats.

This week (2025-08-11 to 2025-08-13): The sentiment shifted to positive. The news on 2025-08-13 indicates "Big Oil Booosts Exploration as Energy Transition Sputters," which is a positive development. A transaction in own shares was also reported. On 2025-08-12, a neutral news item reported a major arbitration win for "Scrappy Gas Billionaires" against Shell.

Key risks/negative factors: No information available.
Positive developments: Big Oil's increased exploration efforts, potentially driven by the sputtering energy transition, is a positive development.

Sentiment outlook for today (2025-08-13): Positive.

SHEL,2025-08-13,100.00,0.00,0.00,positive
